about_the_game:
Contains:
  • 6 Months of Premium - Includes 100 tokens per month, free training matches, full access to the Assistant Manager, and more!
  • A deck of 50 cards with at least 2 legendaries, 2 epics, and 3 rares
  • 5 cosmetic shields to spruce up your club (Premium Shield D10, Premium Shield B1, Premium Shield E2, Premium Shield F5, Premium Shield E9)

This dlc must be redeemed in game under Settings -> DLC
This pack can only be purchased once per account
detailed_description:
Contains:
  • 6 Months of Premium - Includes 100 tokens per month, free training matches, full access to the Assistant Manager, and more!
  • A deck of 50 cards with at least 2 legendaries, 2 epics, and 3 rares
  • 5 cosmetic shields to spruce up your club (Premium Shield D10, Premium Shield B1, Premium Shield E2, Premium Shield F5, Premium Shield E9)

This dlc must be redeemed in game under Settings -> DLC
This pack can only be purchased once per account

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: Multi core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10
  • Processor: Multi core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
